headline: A Fresh Federal Deal: Revisiting ServiceNow (NOW) Valuation as U.S. Government Adoption Accelerates
summary: If you’re following the latest on ServiceNow (NOW), a big announcement just arrived that could shape your decision-making process. The U.S. General Services Administration has tapped ServiceNow’s AI-driven IT service management platform for a sweeping, multi-year agreement intended to power digital transformation across federal agencies. With up to 70% discounts on advanced bundles and a strong government-wide push for modernization, this deal directly bolsters ServiceNow’s presence in the...
